definition: young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
surname Hong
red/popular/revolutionary/bonus

sentences.english: Guys and Dolls crowded under the dim light with drinking, dancing, having fun.
sentences.chinese: 昏暗灯光下的红男绿女挤在一起喝酒，跳舞，玩乐。

sentences.english: This is the street coming and going of Guys and Dolls.
sentences.chinese: 这大街上来来往往的红男绿女。

definition: lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking/debauched and corrupt environment
a place buzzing with activity (idiom)
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
lit. rubbing shoulders and following in each other's footsteps/a thronging crowd

bustling with activity (idiom)
restless

lit. to celebrate peace with songs and dance (idiom)/fig. to make a show of happiness and prosperity

bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
